lead_paragraph: David Perron had a goal and two assists, and Ryan Getzlaf added a goal and his 500th career assist in the streaking Anaheim Ducks' 4-2 victory over the Los Angeles Kings on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Perron, Getzlaf Lead Streaking Ducks Past Rival Kings, 4-2
headline.main: Perron, Getzlaf Lead Streaking Ducks Past Rival Kings, 4-2
